elements.name: Validate that user can send "Posts" api service request successfully and ensure api returns appropriate "Post" information from social network system

steps.name: I setup the required URI to run posts service
I send the posts api service request with given input parameters "userId - 5"
I validate the posts service response code "200"
I validate the posts api service returns appropriate number of posts from system "10"

I validate posts api response includes given attributes
